name: Tactical Football by  Polozor
description:
I love everything in Tactical Football but visual is not as good as the rest of the game.
I've tried to create a more attractive visual in this early version.
I hope you'll enjoy it.
Thx to Thieux who opened the door
Gradient edited with the help of this tools : http://colorzilla.com/gradient-editor/ many thanks to the devs team.
